languages.text: "Но то, ради чего приносятся эти жертвы... немыслимо. Просто немыслимо. Теперь ясно, почему Фабрикатор-Цензор столь дорожил этим чудовищем. Проклятый {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} и его подельники сотворили нечто, выходящее за пределы власти {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Эта машина занимается обработкой мириадов вероятностей, используя колдовство {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}. Она почти закончила исчисления. Она... она предсказывает будущее, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Но то, ради чего приносятся эти жертвы... немыслимо. Просто немыслимо. Теперь ясно, почему Фабрикатор столь дорожил этим чудовищем. Проклятый {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} и его подельники сотворили нечто, выходящее за пределы власти {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Эта машина занимается обработкой мириадов вероятностей, используя колдовство {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}. Она почти закончила исчисления. Она... она предсказывает будущее, {name}".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Но то, ради чего приносятся эти жертвы... немыслимо. Просто немыслимо. Теперь ясно, почему Фабрикатор-Цензор столь дорожил этим чудовищем. Проклятый {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} и его подельники сотворили нечто, выходящее за пределы власти {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Эта машина занимается обработкой мириадов вероятностей, используя колдовство {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}. Она почти закончила исчисления. Она... она предсказывает будущее, {name}".

The cursed tech-priest and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the Omnissiah's power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using warp sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah's{/g} power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “但我根本不敢想象，那些人究竟是为了什么才打算牺牲这里的所有人……那简直是不可想象的事情。现在，我们终于知道为什么铸造审查师这么看重这台怪物了。那个被诅咒的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}和他的同伙创造出了某些可以超越{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}力量极限的东西。他们设计了这台机器，用来处理{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}巫术带来的无数可能性。它几乎已经实现了它的目标，它……它可以预测未来，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “但我根本不敢想象，那些人究竟是为了什么才打算牺牲这里的所有人……那简直是不可想象的事情。现在，我们终于知道为什么铸造审查师这么看重这台怪物了。那个被诅咒的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}和他的同伙创造出了某些可以超越{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}力量极限的东西。他们设计了这台机器，用来处理{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}巫术带来的无数可能性。它几乎已经实现了它的目标，它……它可以预测未来，{name}。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Pero no puedo ni imaginar por qué sacrifican a toda esta gente... Es inconcebible. Ahora sabemos por qué el fabricator-censor valoraba tanto este monstruo. El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} maldito y sus coconspiradores crearon algo que supera los límites del poder del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Esta máquina está diseñada para procesar una miríada de posibilidades mediante hechicería de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Ya casi ha completado su tarea. Pre... predice el futuro, {name}».
languages.original_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Pero no puedo ni imaginar por qué sacrifican a toda esta gente... Es inconcebible. Ahora sabemos por qué el fabricator-censor valoraba tanto este monstruo. El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} maldito y sus coconspiradores crearon algo que supera los límites del poder del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Esta máquina está diseñada para procesar una miríada de posibilidades mediante hechicería de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Ya casi ha completado su tarea. Pre... predice el futuro, {name}».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「だが、これだけの人々を犠牲にする理由は想像すらできない…考えることすらできません。ファブリケーター・センサーがこの怪物を珍重した理由がわかりました。呪われた{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}とその仲間は、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の力の限界を超えたものを作り出したのです。この機械は{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の魔術を使って無数の可能性を処理するように設計されています。それは、ほぼそのタスクを終えている。それは…それは未来を予知するのなのです、{name}さん」
languages.original_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、これだけの人々を犠牲にする理由は想像すらできない…考えることすらできません。ファブリケーター・センサーがこの怪物を珍重した理由がわかりました。呪われた{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}とその仲間は、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の力の限界を超えたものを作り出したのです。この機械は{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の魔術を使って無数の可能性を処理するように設計されています。それは、ほぼそのタスクを終えている。それは…それは未来を予知するのなのです、{name}さん」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Aber ich kann mir nicht einmal vorstellen, warum all diese Leute geopfert werden ... Es ist unvorstellbar. Jetzt wissen wir, warum dieses Monster für den Fabricator-Zensor so wertvoll ist. Der verfluchte {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} und seine Komplizen haben etwas geschaffen, das über die Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} hinausging. Diese Maschine soll mittels {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Zauberei unzählige Möglichkeiten verarbeiten. Sie hat ihre Aufgabe fast erfüllt. Sie ... sagt die Zukunft voraus, {name}."
languages.original_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich kann mir nicht einmal vorstellen, warum all diese Leute geopfert werden ... Es ist unvorstellbar. Jetzt wissen wir, warum dieses Monster für den Fabricator-Zensor so wertvoll ist. Der verfluchte {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} und seine Komplizen haben etwas geschaffen, das über die Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} hinausging. Diese Maschine soll mittels {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Zauberei unzählige Möglichkeiten verarbeiten. Sie hat ihre Aufgabe fast erfüllt. Sie ... sagt die Zukunft voraus, {name}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Mais la raison de ce monstrueux sacrifice est... inimaginable. Inconcevable. Je sais maintenant pourquoi le fabricator-censeur accordait une telle importance à ce monstre. Ce maudit {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} et ses associés ont créé quelque chose qui transcende les limites de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Cette machine est conçue pour traiter une infinité de possibilités grâce à la sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, et elle a presque terminé sa tâche. Elle... elle prédit l'avenir, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Mais la raison de ce monstrueux sacrifice est... inimaginable. Inconcevable. Je sais maintenant pourquoi le fabricator-censeur accordait une telle importance à ce monstre. Ce maudit {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} et ses associés ont créé quelque chose qui transcende les limites de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Cette machine est conçue pour traiter une infinité de possibilités grâce à la sorcellerie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, et elle a presque terminé sa tâche. Elle... elle prédit l'avenir, {name}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bunca insanı kurban etmek için bir sebep göremiyorum... Akıl almaz bir şey bu. Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün bu canavara neden bu denli değer verdiğini öğrenmiş olduk. Kör olası {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, yardakçılarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} kudretini aşan bir şey yaratmış. Bu makinenin üretiliş amacı, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} sahirliğini kullanarak sayısız olasılığı hesaplamaktır. Bu amaca da ulaşmak üzere. Makine... Geleceği görüyor {name}."
languages.original_text: "But I cannot even imagine the reason for sacrificing all these people... It's inconceivable. Now we know why the Fabricator-Censor prized this monster so highly. The cursed {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} and his associates created something that went beyond the limits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s power. This machine is designed to process myriad possibilities using {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} sorcery. It has almost finished its task. It... it predicts the future, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “Bunca insanı kurban etmek için bir sebep göremiyorum... Akıl almaz bir şey bu. Denetçi Fabrikatör’ün bu canavara neden bu denli değer verdiğini öğrenmiş olduk. Kör olası {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, yardakçılarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}’in kudretini aşan bir şey yaratmış. Bu makinenin üretiliş amacı, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} büyüsünü kullanarak sayısız olasılığı hesaplamaktır. Bu amaca da ulaşmak üzere. Makine... Geleceği görüyor {name}.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
